title: Fai Nai Wayu
overview: Wayu is the eldest son and heir of a wealthy family. His stepmother and her own son conspire to take over the estate. They make Wayu believe that he has killed his own brother. Wayu in an attempt to escape guilt, runs away only to end up at a nearby farm. The only daughter of the farm Lukwha treats him with kindness and sincerity. Together they work through what happened the night his brother died.
